Summon Ugallu

Summon Commander:#3095 Ugallu
The caster summons an Ugallu to smite the demons of evil. Ugallus are lesser storm deities of enkidu legends revered since before the founding of the First City. They appear as lion-headed men with donkey ears and bird feet. They command the weather and carry demon slaying bronze daggers and flint maces that halts demons in their steps.
